con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date == [2016,9]

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date == [2016,10]

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.get(0).date == [2016,9] assert slurperresponse.date.get(1) == [2016,10]

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.actualDay == [2016,9,1] assert slurperresponse.requiredMinPerDay == 300

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.actualDay == [2016,9,1] assert slurperresponse.requiredMinPerDay == 300

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.get(0).days.get(0).actualDay == [2016,9,1] assert slurperresponse.get(0).days.get(0).requiredMinPerDay == 300

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.get(0).actualDay == [2016,9,1] assert slurperresponse.get(0).requiredMinPerDay == 300

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "1234" assert slurperresponse.comment == "task1" assert slurperresponse.startTime == [12,0] assert slurperresponse.endTime == [12,0]

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "1234" assert slurperresponse.comment == "task1" assert slurperresponse.startTime == [12,0] assert slurperresponse.endTime == [12,0]
